body:
## Expected Behavior
PostgreSQL persistence tests should correctly drop test database

## Actual Behavior
`test panicked: pq: database "test_1008214627_jyv" is being accessed by other users`

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. Run any PostgreSQL tests

## Specifications

  - Version: master
  - Platform: N/A
title: PostgreSQL persistence tests should correctly drop test database
